page.title: 14A Day in the Life of...
page.content: On Saturday I woke up at about 8.30a.m. After lying in bed a while I looked out of the window and saw it was a sunny day.I went into my sister's bedroom to watch television until mum brought us some porridge and a letter brought by the postman.About 10.00a.m. I went outside to play. Dad was at work and mum was cleaning up. I came in at 11.15a.m.,watched television again and then did some throwing and catching practice.Dad came home early as my sister was ill so that Mum and I could go into town shopping.We ate our dinner of ham sandwiches in the car park.At 3.00p.m. we returned home.I spent the afternoon in the garden reading and in the evening we all watched a film about an adventure in space.By 9.30p.m. my sister and I were in bed.
